title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use the marketplace. By using the service, you consent to these practices.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.body: We collect account details, contact information, device data, and usage analytics. Some data is provided by you directly; some is collected automatically.

use.title: 2. How We Use Information
use.body: We use data to provide and improve the service, personalize content, process payments, prevent fraud, and communicate with you about your account and updates.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing
sharing.body: We may share information with service providers (payments, analytics, hosting), with law enforcement when required, and in business transfers. We do not sell your personal data.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.body: We use cookies and similar technologies for authentication, preferences, analytics, and performance. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

security.title: 5. Security
security.body: We implement reasonable security measures, but no system is 100% secure. Keep your credentials confidential and notify us of any suspected breach.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.body: Depending on your region, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.body: We retain data as long as needed to provide the service and for legitimate business purposes. When no longer needed, we delete or anonymize it.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.body: We may update this Policy. Continued use after updates means you accept the changes.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.body: Questions about privacy? Contact support via the help center or email us using the contact details in the app.

help.title: Need help?
help.body: If you have questions about this Policy or how your data is handled, reach out via our help center.
